name: Pie Grab
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam #89.

Pie Grab is a stealth-based game featuring Big Foot himself! Big Foot has recently discovered his love of pumpkin pies! Help Big Foot cross the forest in search of the deliciousness. There are also pumpkins to collect for him to attempt to make it himself. Beware of the Big Foot hunters, as they lurk through the forest to capture any glimpse they can of Big Foot.
